name: Cycle 28
description: A fast-paced shooter but you're stuck in a time loop. First you think it's an arcade game: simple controls, powerful upgrades, and intense dogfights. But youâ€™re living the same day over and over, trying to find out who the enemy are, and what they want.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or 7 Processor: Quad Core 2.40Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: Minimum resolution of 1920x1080 is recommended
